Package it.unimore.iot.health.api.datamanager.persistence

Interface IInventoryDataManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
InventoryDataManager
public interface IInventoryDataManager
IInventoryDataManager is an interface that is implemented in this project by InventoryDataManager. This interface provides a series of methods in order to manage the inventory of both patients and healtchchecks.
Author:
Christopher Zanoli, Undergraduate student - 270765@studenti.unimore.it

      Optional<PatientDescriptor> getPatientById(String patientId) throws DataManagerException
      This method allows to get a specific patient, identified by its id passed as input.
      Parameters:
      patientId - is a String representing the patient identifier.
      Throws:
      DataManagerException

    • getHealthCheckByFilter

      List<HealthCheckDescriptor> getHealthCheckByFilter(String patientId, String anomaly) throws DataManagerException
      This method allows to retrieve a filtered healthcheck list.
      Parameters:
      patientId - it is a string representing the patient identifier.
      anomaly - it is a string representing the type of measurement whose anomalies are to be found.
      Throws:
      DataManagerException
